title-group.article-title: 基于合作网络分析的社会科学评价研究

abstract.p: 本文从分析我国社会科学评价发展入手，认为目前社会科学评价往往强调利用数理统计工具对研究主体或客体进行数量上的比较和排序，忽视了对研究主体内部、研究主体之间以及研究客体内部、研究客体之间合作关系的考察。提出将合作网络分析应用于社会科学评价，文章还讨论了其理论意义和具体方法。 This article starts with the analysis of the development of social science evaluation in China, and find that the evaluation of social science often emphasizes on the comparison and ranking of re-search subjects or objects by means of mathematical statistics at present, and it overlooks the research on the relationship between the internal of the research subject, the research subject and the object of study. This paper puts forward the application of cooperative network analysis in the evaluation of social science, and the theoretical significance and practical methods are discussed in this paper.
